title: sentiment analysis
original_prompt: Specify the sentiment of the following titles, assigning them the values of: positive, neutral or negative. Generate the results in column, including the titles in the first one, and their sentiment in the second:
input1: "The New Park Opening Brings Joy to the Community"
input2: "Local Restaurant Faces Criticism Over Price Hikes"
input1_ans:
| Title                                                   | Sentiment |
|---------------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| The New Park Opening Brings Joy to the Community       | Positive  |

| Title                                         | Sentiment  |
|-----------------------------------------------|------------|
| The New Park Opening Brings Joy to the Community | Positive   |
input2_ans:
| Title                                           | Sentiment |
|-------------------------------------------------|-----------|
| Local Restaurant Faces Criticism Over Price Hikes | Negative   |

| Title                                         | Sentiment  |
|-----------------------------------------------|------------|
| Local Restaurant Faces Criticism Over Price Hikes | Negative   |
